title: Calling an Action
description: Calling an action tells the program to run the code in the action that is called. Call the PrintMenu action twice by typing the action name followed by a left and right paren. When you ran the program did the program output the menu twice?
hint: In the Main action add two action calls for PrintMenu using the format, PrintMenu(). Remember the name must match exactly to the defined action name, including the correct cases.
